attributes.action: Government to put pressure on G8 to stop world hunger
attributes.additional_details: There is enough food in the world for everyone, but 1 in 8 people in the world are hungry. By following the aims of the IF campaign (http://enoughfoodif.org/), the G8 leaders, who are being hosted by the UK this summer, will help stop world hunger. Please sign this petition so that the government will lead the G8 in following these aims.
